articles.author: Robin Webb, Angie DiMichele, Bill Kearney
articles.title: Philippe pivots east, struggles; another system likely off Africa - South Florida Sun Sentinel
articles.description: A “disorganized” Tropical Storm Philippe is expected to gradually weaken this week, while a tropical depression is likely to form within days from a system in the Atlantic not far behin…
articles.content: Tropical Storm Philippe path is pivoting west toward the eastern Caribbean, but is hampered by wind shear. Meanwhile, off Africa, a tropical depression is likely to form within days, and follow not f… [+1270 chars]
